Codo » Index » Lemonette » D

Class: Lemonette.D

Defined in: app/scripts/application/date/date_helper.coffee

Overview

D a spiced Date

Examples:

Using D 

App = new Lemonette.Application
spicedDate = new App.DateHelper.D
console.log d.isToday() # => true
console.log d.toString() # => 2015-02-26
console.log d.startOfWeek() # => 2015-02-23
console.log d.endOfWeek() # => 2015-03-01

Parameters:

# (Boolean) isToday()

Test if date is today

Returns:

  • ( Boolean ) — true: if is today, false:if is not today

# (Lemonette.D) startOfWeek()

Start of week starting with D Date.

Returns:

  • ( Lemonette.D ) — instance with first day of week

# (Lemonette.D) endOfWeek()

End of week starting with D Date.

Returns:

  • ( Lemonette.D ) — instance with end day of week
